footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Bennett | Update Date: 08/24/2022 | Editor: SirDerpyHerp#7903

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Mistsplitter Reforged__ /
__Aquila Favonia__
Highest Base ATK weapons, makes his buffs even better.

__Freedom-Sworn__
Honourable mention, it can potentially give a bigger ATK buff than the weapons above if you can reliably proc the passive.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Skyward Blade__
High Base ATK + a hefty amount of ER, very solid option.
__Alley Flash__
Highest 4* Base ATK but useless passive and substat, use it if you have it but with the addition of Sapwood Blade, it's not worth pulling for as it is a limited weapon banner exclusive.
__Sapwood Blade__
2nd highest Base ATK for a 4* with an ER substat, it's also craftable!

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge / HP% |<goblet>  HP% |<circlet>  Healing Bonus / HP%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Fantastic Voyage
**2)** Elemental Skill: Passion Overload
**3)** Normal Attack: Strike of Fortune

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
He should meet his ER requirements before investing into other stats. Generally speaking, he should have at least 200% ER, though it may vary between teams.
4p Instructor should only be used early game or for nuke showcases, as 4* artifacts sets have lower main stats, making him less comfortable to use.
